p: For the reaction of [{Fe(CO) 4}(η 2‐As 2H 2}] ( 2) with [{Cr(CO) 5}(thf)], an isostructural compound to 3 was expected. Instead, however, the new compound [{Fe 2(CO) 8}AsH{Cr(CO) 5}] ( 4) (Scheme 3) is obtained in 20 % yield after column chromatographic workup of the reaction mixture. Besides crystals of 4, very few crystals of [Fe 3(CO) 9{μ 3‐AsCr(CO) 5} 2] ( 5) were obtained and identified by single crystal X‐ray diffractions and by mass spectrometry. The structure of the latter compound 5 was already reported. 25
